mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_access_record ( msg_id, msg_type, from_user_name, to_user_name, create_time, header, req, rsp, access_type, access_key ) VALUES ( #{msgId}, #{msgType}, #{fromUserName}, #{toUserName}, #{createTime}, #{header}, #{req}, #{rsp}, #{accessType}, #{accessKey} )
mapper.select: SELECT access_key FROM t_access_record WHERE length(rsp) > 0 and from_user_name != "oBY566s96Ou1Yn16HdbxCfh_wW5c" AND length(access_key) > 0 GROUP BY access_key ORDER BY count(*) DESC, MAX(create_time) DESC LIMIT 120
SELECT count(*) FROM t_access_record WHERE create_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')) AND from_user_name != "oBY566s96Ou1Yn16HdbxCfh_wW5c";
SELECT count(DISTINCT from_user_name) FROM t_access_record WHERE create_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')) AND from_user_name != "oBY566s96Ou1Yn16HdbxCfh_wW5c";
